alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 7:59PM CST until February 04 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills in the single digits to near 10 degrees above zero. The Winter Weather Advisory has been cancelled with little icing impacts being reported across the county from local Emergency Management. * WHERE...Val Verde County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...A risk for hypothermia exists for those spending extended time outdoors and not dressed in layers and gloves.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that very cold air and strong winds will combine to generate low wind chills. This will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If you must venture outdoors...make sure you wear a hat and gloves.
